mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_inquiry (inquiry_no, customer_name, customer_phone, customer_email, inquiry_title, inquiry_content) VALUES(SEQ_INQUIRY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{customer_name}, #{customer_phone}, #{customer_email}, #{inquiry_title}, #{inquiry_content})
mapper.select: SELECT inquiry_no, inquiry_title, inquiry_created, inquiry_status FROM tbl_inquiry ORDER BY inquiry_no DESC
